name: lottie-react-native

scripts.build:pods: cd example/ios; bundle exec pod install; cd -
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build && cd _book && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'update book' && git fetch git@github.com:airbnb/lottie-react-native.git gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am 'update book' && git push git@github.com:airbnb/lottie-react-native.git gh-pages --force
